content: The act of giving also means that you have something valuable to share with others. We can hone our skills in order to give real help, so definitely win-win. People use it as a promotion technique. Once we realize it, we will prevent from being fooled. Free staff may be a trap. On the other hand, we want to stand out from the crowd and get hired or promoted whatsoever, it’s worth providing your value without expecting from others, then you will get more than you expect.
